text: Nedunuri Krishnamurthy (10 October 1927 â€“ 8 December 2014) was an Indian Carnatic vocalist. He was known for performing songs about meditation and peace. He also wrote classical music. He was born in Kothapalli, Hyderabad State, British India. Krishnamurthy died in Visakhapatnam, India from lung cancer, aged 87. ==Other websites== * Website about Nedunuri Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Indian musicians Category:Indian singers
title: Nedunuri Krishnamurthy
